title: Wicked Saints
description: Some stories are so beautiful, so brutal, that they claw at your heart and refuse to let go. Welcome to the world of Wicked Saints—an epic, passionate novel that you won't soon forget. Prepare to meet:A GIRL named Nadya, who hears the whisper of the gods inside her head.A PRINCE surrounded by desperate suitors and deadly assassinsA MONSTER hidden behind pale, tortured eyes — and a smile that cuts like a knifeThe paths of these three characters become entwined during a centuriea-long war filled with sinners and saints, magic and mystery, and a star-crossed romance that threatens to tip the scales between dark and light . .. forever.
author: Emily A. Duncan
